name: The Handshake
description:
The Handshake is an intimacy tool for roleplay, whether live action or tabletop, encouraging enthusiastic and repeated consent while representing intimate encounters. It uses an engaging handshake or edible fruits and chocolates to represent intimacy and uses the Script Change RPG Toolbox for additional safety. It is intended for this tool to be used by consenting adults only.

This is a submission to the #TechJam. The Handshake is CC-BY Attribution 4.0.

The full raw text is in this devlog.
